crypto

Class PrivateKey

  • java.lang.Object
    • crypto.PrivateKey

  • public class PrivateKey
extends java.lang.Object
    The class represents the 'PrivateKey' object with its components: -the private exponent 'privateD'. -the modulus 'modulusN'.
    Version:
    2..0.
    Author:
    Svetoslav Mihovski.
    See Also:
    Class., Class.

      • decrypt

        public byte[] decrypt(byte[] cipherText)
        Decrypt message from 'encryptedMessage' using the private key exponent 'd'.
        Parameters:
        cipherText - ; ciphertext message.
        Returns:
        byte array with decrypted message. Code for the method is adopted and modified from: https://github.com/o083to/rsa/blob/master/src/main/java/algoritm/rsa/PrivateKey.java By o083to (Accessed in March 2018)

      • encrypt

        public byte[] encrypt(byte[] plainText)
        Encrypt message from 'encryptedMessage' using the private key exponent 'd'.
        Parameters:
        plainText - ; plaintext message.
        Returns:
        byte array with encrypted message. Code for the method is adopted and modified from: https://github.com/o083to/rsa/blob/master/src/main/java/algoritm/rsa/PrivateKey.java By o083to (Accessed in March 2018)
